text: John Thomas "Sib" Hashian (August 17, 1949 - March 22, 2017) was an American musician. He was best known as a drummer for the rock band Boston. He was born in Boston, Massachusetts. Hashian had a daughter, Lauren who has been in a relationship with Dwayne Johnson since 2007. Hashian died from a possible heart attack while on a cruise ship near Nassau, Bahamas on March 22, 2017, aged 67. ==References== Category:1949 births Category:2017 deaths Category:Deaths from myocardial infarction Category:American rock drummers Category:Musicians from Boston
title: Sib Hashian
